properties.title: Sparta
properties.description: Sparta was a prominent city-state (polis) of ancient Greece.

properties.title: Pylos
properties.description: An archaic through Roman settlement located at the Armatova hill, west of Agrapidochori in Ileia in the Peloponnese.

properties.title: Taphos (island)
properties.description: An ancient place, cited: BAtlas 54 C4 Taphos Ins.

properties.title: Ithaca (island)
properties.description: An ancient place, cited: BAtlas 54 C5 Ithaca Ins.

properties.title: Ithaca
properties.description: An ancient place, cited: BAtlas 54 C5 Ithaca

properties.title: Ilium/Troia
properties.description: An ancient city of northwest Anatolia with occupation ranging from the Bronze Age to the Roman period. Troy features as the central setting of Homer's Iliad.
